p: Phylogenetic analysis based on all the available DENV-2 cosmopolitan genotype complete coding sequences ( n = 30) suggested that the Kenyan strains form a single monophyletic cluster, and the strain T90_S83 from New Delhi, India (year 2014) formed an out-group for all the recent Kenyan DENV-2 strains. These strains clustered further with strain RGCB880 from Kerala, India (year 2010) ( Fig 3A).
